013package org.apache.juneau.microservice.jetty;
014
015import java.io.*;
016import java.util.*;
017
018import org.apache.juneau.common.utils.*;
019import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
020import org.eclipse.jetty.server.*;
021import org.eclipse.jetty.util.resource.*;
022import org.eclipse.jetty.xml.*;
023
024/**
025 * Basic implementation of a Jetty server factory.
026 *
027 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
028 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauMicroserviceJettyBasics">juneau-microservice-jetty Basics</a>
029 * </ul>
030 */
031public class BasicJettyServerFactory implements JettyServerFactory {
032
033   @Override
034   public Server create(String jettyXml) throws Exception {
035       Objects.requireNonNull(jettyXml, "jetty.xml file location was not specified in the configuration file (Jetty/config) or manifest file (Jetty-Config) or found on the file system or classpath.");
036      File f = FileUtils.createTempFile("jetty.xml");
037      try (Reader r = new StringReader(jettyXml); Writer w = new FileWriter(f)) {
038         IOUtils.pipe(r, w);
039         w.flush();
040      }
041      XmlConfiguration xmlConfiguration = new XmlConfiguration(new PathResourceFactory().newResource(f.toPath()));
042      return (Server)xmlConfiguration.configure();
043   }
044}
